div.div:
Great River School Building Closed March 18th - May 4th* Great River students begin Distance learning at home on Monday April 6th click here to read ALL public health statements concerning COVID-19﻿ *per order by Minnesota Governor, all school buildings are closed, except for childcare for qualifying families. YOU CAN FIND ALL DISTANCE LEARNING INFORMATION ON OUR LEARNING AT HOME WEBSITE BY CLICKING HERE     OUR KITCHEN IS STILL SERVING DELICIOUS AND SAFE MEALS DURING THE SCHOOL CLOSURE - CLICK HERE FOR MORE INFO We support students to be peace-builders in their communities. Great River School, a Montessori learning community, prepares students for their unique roles as responsible and engaged citizens of the world. Great River School integrates academic and social experiences in an environment of civility and trust. The Montessori philosophy and the International Baccalaureate diploma program inform the curriculum and pedagogy, inspiring deep questioning and peaceful action. Great River School fosters self-expression in a supportive environment that values critical thinking and work for social justice. We address issues of systemic oppression through open dialogue. We encourage community participation and critical contributions to improve our world, our school, and our practices in creating an inclusive and dignified world for students.
Subscribe to our monthly newsletter!

div.p: Great River School encourages students to seek new challenges and explore their abilities. Instruction through travel, practical learning, the arts, and micro-economic ventures provide relevant skills to meet the world with compassion and a sense of responsibility.

img.alt: Families were emailed an update on distance learning through the end of the school year, per Gov Walz's announcement today. Read the whole letter here: http://ow.ly/BqFp50zmUpD

We're still here making enough mac 'n cheese to swim in! Roasted vegetables and a fresh garden salad accompany all that cheese - we have to make sure you're still eating your veggies! Get your orders in by tomorrow at 4pm for next week's pickup: www.greatriverschool.org/herontogo
